name: Ready Or Not
summary: Ready or Not is an intense, tactical, first-person shooter that depicts a modern-day world in which SWAT police units are called to defuse hostile and confronting situations.
info:
• 中文名: 严阵以待
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: FPS / Tactical shooter
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 4
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2021-12-17 (Early Access)
  • 官方网站: http://voidinteractive.net/
  • 开发: VOID Interactive
  • 发行: VOID Interactive
